verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תַעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su Ye shall make לָכֶ֜ם la-Chem אֱלִילִ֗ם <WH457> 'e-li-Lim, you no idols וּפֶ֤סֶל <WH6459> u-Fe-sel nor graven image וּמַצֵּבָה֙ <WH4676> u-matz-tze-Vah a standing image לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תָקִ֣ימוּ <WH6965> ta-Ki-mu neither rear you up לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וְאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> ve-'E-ven of stone מַשְׂכִּ֗ית <WH4906> mas-Kit, [any] image לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo nor תִתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu neither shall ye set up בְּאַרְצְכֶ֔ם <WH776> be-'ar-tze-Chem, in your land לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <WH7812> le-hish-ta-cha-Vot to bow down עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha; and כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto it for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שַׁבְּתֹתַ֣י <WH7676> shab-be-to-Tai my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֔רוּ <WH8104> tish-Mo-ru, Ye shall keep וּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> u-mik-da-Shi my sanctuary תִּירָ֑אוּ <WH3372> ti-Ra-'u; and reverence אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If בְּחֻקֹּתַ֖י <WH2708> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> te-Le-chu; walk וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִצְוֹתַ֣י <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tai my commandments תִּשְׁמְר֔וּ <WH8104> tish-me-Ru, and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> va-'a-si-Tem and do אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti Then I will give גִשְׁמֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1653> gish-mei-Chem you rain בְּעִתָּ֑ם <WH6256> be-'it-Tam; in due season וְנָתְנָ֤ה <WH5414> ve-nat-Nah shall yield הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz and the land יְבוּלָ֔הּ <WH2981> ye-vu-Lah, her increase וְעֵ֥ץ <WH6086> ve-'Etz and the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh of the field יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> yit-Ten shall yield פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <WH6529> pir-Yo. their fruit

וְהִשִּׂ֨יג <WH5381> ve-his-Sig shall reach לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem דַּ֙יִשׁ֙ <WH1786> da-yish And your threshing אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בָּצִ֔יר <WH1210> ba-Tzir, unto the vintage וּבָצִ֖יר <WH1210> u-va-Tzir and the vintage יַשִּׂ֣יג <WH5381> yas-Sig shall reach אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זָ֑רַע <WH2233> Za-ra'; unto the sowing time וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> va-'a-chal-Tem and ye shall eat לַחְמְכֶם֙ <WH3899> lach-me-Chem your bread לָשֹׂ֔בַע <WH7648> la-Soa', to the full וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH3427> vi-shav-Tem and dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach safely בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <WH776> be-'ar-tze-Chem. in your land

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will give שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> sha-lOm peace בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, in the land וּשְׁכַבְתֶּ֖ם <WH7901> u-she-chav-Tem and ye shall lie down וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein no מַחֲרִ֑יד <WH2729> ma-cha-Rid; and none shall make [you] afraid וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֞י <WH7673> ve-hish-bat-Ti and I will rid חַיָּ֤ה <WH2416> chai-Yah beasts רָעָה֙ <WH7451> ra-'Ah evil מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, out of the land וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ve-Che-rev neither shall the sword לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- and no תַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> ta-'a-Vor go בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <WH776> be-'ar-tze-Chem. through your land

וּרְדַפְתֶּ֖ם <WH7291> u-re-daf-Tem And ye shall chase אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem; your enemies וְנָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> ve-na-fe-Lu and they shall fall לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem before לֶחָֽרֶב <WH2719> le-Cha-rev you by the sword

וְרָדְפוּ֨ <WH7291> ve-rad-Fu of you shall chase מִכֶּ֤ם <WH4480> mik-Kem at חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah And five מֵאָ֔ה <WH3967> me-'Ah, an hundred וּמֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> u-me-'Ah and an hundred מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> mik-Kem at רְבָבָ֣ה <WH7233> re-va-Vah of you shall put ten thousand יִרְדֹּ֑פוּ <WH7291> yir-Do-fu; to flight וְנָפְל֧וּ <WH5307> ve-naf-Lu shall fall אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem and your enemies לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem before לֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> le-Cha-rev. you by the sword

וּפָנִ֣יתִי <WH6437> u-fa-Ni-ti For I will have respect אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem, toward וְהִפְרֵיתִ֣י <WH6509> ve-hif-rei-Ti unto you and make you fruitful אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֖י <WH7235> ve-hir-bei-Ti and multiply אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; וַהֲקִימֹתִ֥י <WH6965> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti you and establish אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> 'it-te-Chem. for

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <WH398> va-'a-chal-Tem And ye shall eat יָשָׁ֖ן <WH3465> ya-Shan the old נוֹשָׁ֑ן <WH3462> no-Shan; old store וְיָשָׁ֕ן <WH3462> ve-ya-Shan supply מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei because חָדָ֖שׁ <WH2319> cha-Dash of the new תּוֹצִֽיאוּ׃ <WH3318> to-Tzi-'u. and bring forth

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will set מִשְׁכָּנִ֖י <WH4908> mish-ka-Ni my tabernacle בְּתוֹכְכֶ֑ם <WH8432> be-toch-Chem; among וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- will not תִגְעַ֥ל <WH1602> tig-'Al shall not abhor נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> naf-Shi you and my soul אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

וְהִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֙ <WH1980> ve-hit-hal-lach-Ti And I will walk בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <WH8432> be-Toch-Chem, among וְהָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> ve-ha-Yi-ti you and will be לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> le-lo-Him; your God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem and ye תִּהְיוּ־ <WH1961> tih-yu- and ye shall be לִ֥י li לְעָֽם׃ <WH5971> le-'Am. my people

אֲנִ֞י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הוֹצֵ֤אתִי <WH3318> ho-Tze-ti which brought you forth אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt מִֽהְיֹ֥ת <WH1961> mih-Yot become לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem עֲבָדִ֑ים <WH5650> 'a-va-Dim; that ye should not be their bondmen וָאֶשְׁבֹּר֙ <WH7665> va-'esh-Bor and I have broken מֹטֹ֣ת <WH4133> mo-Tot the bands עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <WH5923> 'ul-le-Chem, of your yoke וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> va-'o-Lech walk אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem קֽוֹמְמִיּֽוּת׃ <WH6968> Kom-mi-Yut. upright פ Peh

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> tish-me-'U But if ye will not hearken לִ֑י Li; וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su, unto me and will not do אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַמִּצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> ham-mitz-Vot all these commandments הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if בְּחֻקֹּתַ֣י <WH2708> be-chuk-ko-Tai my statutes תִּמְאָ֔סוּ <WH3988> tim-'A-su, And if ye shall despise וְאִ֥ם <WH518> ve-'Im and if אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> mish-pa-Tai my judgments תִּגְעַ֣ל <WH1602> tig-'Al abhor נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> naf-she-Chem; or if your soul לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not עֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> 'a-sOt so that ye will not do אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מִצְוֹתַ֔י <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tai, all my commandments לְהַפְרְכֶ֖ם <WH6565> le-haf-re-Chem [but] that ye break אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <WH1285> be-ri-Ti. my covenant

אַף־ <WH637> 'af- turn אֲנִ֞י <WH589> 'a-Ni I אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> 'e-'e-seh- I also will do זֹּ֣את <WH2063> zot likewise לָכֶ֗ם la-Chem, וְהִפְקַדְתִּ֨י <WH6485> ve-hif-kad-Ti this unto you I will even appoint עֲלֵיכֶ֤ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem over בֶּֽהָלָה֙ <WH928> be-ha-Lah over you terror אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשַּׁחֶ֣פֶת <WH7829> hash-sha-Che-fet consumption וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַקַּדַּ֔חַת <WH6920> hak-kad-Da-chat, and the burning ague מְכַלּ֥וֹת <WH3615> me-chal-Lot that shall consume עֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> 'ei-Na-yim the eyes וּמְדִיבֹ֣ת <WH1727> u-me-di-Vot and cause sorrow נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> Na-fesh; of heart וּזְרַעְתֶּ֤ם <WH2232> u-ze-ra'-Tem and ye shall sow לָרִיק֙ <WH7385> la-Rik in vain זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <WH2233> zar-'a-Chem, your seed וַאֲכָלֻ֖הוּ <WH398> va-'a-cha-Lu-hu shall eat אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem. for your enemies

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will set פָנַי֙ <WH6440> fa-Nai my face בָּכֶ֔ם ba-Chem, וְנִגַּפְתֶּ֖ם <WH5062> ve-nig-gaf-Tem against you and ye shall be slain לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem; your enemies וְרָד֤וּ <WH7287> ve-ra-Du you shall reign בָכֶם֙ va-Chem שֹֽׂנְאֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8130> so-ne-'ei-Chem, they that hate וְנַסְתֶּ֖ם <WH5127> ve-nas-Tem over you and ye shall flee וְאֵין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- no רֹדֵ֥ף <WH7291> ro-Def when none pursueth אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem. ס sa-Mek

וְאִ֨ם־ <WH518> ve-'Im- If עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- And if ye will not yet אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh, these לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> tish-me-'U for all this hearken לִ֑י Li; וְיָסַפְתִּי֙ <WH3254> ve-ya-saf-Ti more לְיַסְּרָ֣ה <WH3256> le-yas-se-Rah unto me then I will punish אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> She-va' you seven times עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH2403> chat-to-tei-Chem. for your sins

וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֖י <WH7665> ve-sha-var-Ti And I will break אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> ge-'on the pride עֻזְּכֶ֑ם <WH5797> 'uz-ze-Chem; of your power וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמֵיכֶם֙ <WH8064> she-mei-Chem your heaven כַּבַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> kab-bar-Zel, as iron וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַרְצְכֶ֖ם <WH776> 'ar-tze-Chem and your earth כַּנְּחֻשָֽׁה׃ <WH5154> kan-ne-chu-Shah. as brass

וְתַ֥ם <WH8552> ve-Tam shall be spent לָרִ֖יק <WH7385> la-Rik in vain כֹּחֲכֶ֑ם <WH3581> ko-cha-Chem; And your strength וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- will not תִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> tit-Ten shall not yield אַרְצְכֶם֙ <WH776> 'ar-tze-Chem for your land אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְבוּלָ֔הּ <WH2981> ye-vu-Lah, her increase וְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> ve-'Etz neither shall the trees הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, of the land לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo will not יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yit-Ten yield פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <WH6529> pir-Yo. their fruits

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- If תֵּֽלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> te-le-Chu act עִמִּי֙ <WH5973> 'im-Mi against קֶ֔רִי <WH7147> Ke-ri, contrary וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not תֹאב֖וּ <WH14> to-Vu unto me and will לִשְׁמֹ֣עַֽ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a' not hearken לִ֑י Li; וְיָסַפְתִּ֤י <WH3254> ve-ya-saf-Ti more עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem and מַכָּ֔ה <WH4347> mak-Kah, plagues שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven times כְּחַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH2403> ke-chat-to-tei-Chem. upon you according to your sins

וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּ֨י <WH7971> ve-hish-lach-Ti I will also send בָכֶ֜ם va-Chem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> chai-Yat beasts הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> has-sa-Deh wild וְשִׁכְּלָ֣ה <WH7921> ve-shik-ke-Lah among you which shall rob you of your children אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, וְהִכְרִ֙יתָה֙ <WH3772> ve-hich-Ri-tah and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּהֶמְתְּכֶ֔ם <WH929> be-hem-te-Chem, your cattle וְהִמְעִ֖יטָה <WH4591> ve-him-'I-tah and make you few in number אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; וְנָשַׁ֖מּוּ <WH8074> ve-na-Sham-mu shall be desolate דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1870> dar-chei-Chem. and your [high] ways

וְאִ֨ם־ <WH518> ve-'Im- and if בְּאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> be-'El-leh, these לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo are not תִוָּסְר֖וּ <WH3256> tiv-vas-Ru And if ye will not be reformed לִ֑י Li; וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֥ם <WH1980> va-ha-lach-Tem by me by these things but will walk עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> 'im-Mi against קֶֽרִי׃ <WH7147> Ke-ri. contrary
